div3.head: PROPOSITION 27.

p.hi: If from an odd number an even number be subtracted, the remainder will be odd.

div3.p: For from the odd number AB let the even number BC be subtracted; I say that the remainder CA is odd.
Let the unit AD be subtracted; therefore DB is even. [VII. Def. 7]
Therefore CA is odd. [VII. Def. 7] Q. E. D.
